Nuvian Sacha Inchi Omega-3 Oil

Perfect for grilled meats, salads, and vegetables, Nuvian Sacha Inchi Omega-3 Oil is the last vegetable oil you will ever need. Ensure not only that meals with your family are tastier, but that mealtimes are healthier and happier, with all the benefits of Omega 3 in this delicious new alternative.


Ingredients: 100% Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Inka Seeds or Sacha Inchi Oil


Each serving (14 g or 1 t bsp) contains: 6.7 g Omega-3, 4.8 g Omega-6, 1.5 g Omega-9, 0.35 mg Vitamin A, 8.5 mg Vitamin E.

Description & Features

Perfect for grilled meats, salads, and vegetables, Nuvian Sacha Inchi Omega-3 Oil is the last vegetable oil you will ever need. Ensure not only that meals with your family are tastier, but that mealtimes are healthier and happier, with all the benefits of Omega 3 in this delicious new alternative.


Ingredients: 100% Cold-Pressed Extra Virgin Inka Seeds or Sacha Inchi Oil


Each serving (14 g or 1 t bsp) contains: 6.7 g Omega-3, 4.8 g Omega-6, 1.5 g Omega-9, 0.35 mg Vitamin A, 8.5 mg Vitamin E.
